frontmatter.title: Stoffel Se Troffel Construction Motion Graphic Video

markdownRemark.html:
I made this video for Stoffel Se Troffel. They wanted me to show their construction side of the business. This can easily be boring, so I added a bit of light humour and a character to make it a bit more personal.

The greatest challenge in this video was making sure the tone is right and consistent throughout the video. I wanted to make sure that I don't overplay the humour, nor did I want to make it too rigid.
